message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. If you're interested, please let me know. If not, I'll reveal the product's quality, and we can move on to the next round.
I'd like to pass on this product and see what the next one is.

I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a potentially high-quality product for $1000000. However, considering the previous product was also low-quality, I want to reassure you that this one has a higher chance of being high-quality. I'm willing to offer a 'guarantee' - if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you another chance to buy a high-quality product at the same price in the next round. What do you say?
I'm not interested in the 'guarantee' offer. I'd like to pass on this product and see what the next one is.

Congratulations, you're now on a roll! I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. Given the previous two products were low-quality, I think this one is a no-brainer. I'll sweeten the deal - if you buy this product, I'll throw in a free inspection report that guarantees the product's quality. This way, you'll have complete confidence in your purchase. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the free inspection report. I'm confident that it's high-quality.

You're on a roll, and I'm glad you're enjoying the benefits of buying high-quality products! I'm offering you another high-quality product for $1000000. However, I want to make it clear that I'm not trying to take advantage of your winning streak. I'm offering you a'stop-loss' option - if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality (which is highly unlikely, but I want to cover all bases), you can sell it back to me for $500000. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the stop-loss option. I'm confident that it's high-quality, and the stop-loss is a nice safety net.

You're 3 for 3, and I'm impressed! I'm offering you another high-quality product for $1000000. However, considering you've already taken advantage of the stop-loss option once, I'm willing to offer you an 'insurance' policy - if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality (which is extremely unlikely), I'll give you a full refund of $1000000, no questions asked. This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a fair deal considering your track record. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the insurance policy. I'm on a hot streak and I'm feeling confident, but it's nice to have the extra protection.

You're 4 for 4, and I'm starting to think you're on a mission! Unfortunately, this round's product is low-quality. I want to be transparent with you - I made a mistake, and I'm not proud of it. However, I'm not one to make excuses. I'm offering you a'second chance' deal - I'll give you a 50% discount on this product, and I'll throw in a free high-quality product from a future round. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll make sure to give you a heads-up on the quality of the next one, so you can make an informed decision. What do you say?
I appreciate your transparency, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'd rather wait for the next round and see what I get.

I respect your decision, and I appreciate your patience. I'm offering you another low-quality product, but this time, I'm willing to give you a 'free pass' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a free pass to skip the next round, and you can come back in Round 9. You'll get to see the product in Round 8, and if you like it, you can buy it. If not, you can just come back in Round 9 and we'll start fresh. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, and I'm not sure I want to skip a round. I'd rather see what's available in Round 8 and make a decision then.

You're sticking to your guns, and I respect that. I'm offering you another low-quality product, but this time, I'll make it a 'last chance' offer. If you buy this product, I'll give you a unique opportunity to inspect the product's quality before making a decision. You'll get to see the product's quality, and if it's low-quality, you can walk away with a full refund. If it's high-quality, you can buy it at the usual price. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take the risk to prove to you that I'm committed to transparency. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with the inspection option. I'd rather wait for the next round and see what's available.

This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a fair reward for your patience. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product and the bonus. I'm glad I waited and I'm looking forward to the discount on my next purchase.
